General.Name: Amplifon S.p.A.
General.Description: Amplifon S.p.A. engages in the distribution of hearing solutions that help people rediscover various emotions of sound in Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Americas, and the Asia Pacific. The company offers ampli-easy, ampli-mini, ampli-connect, and ampli-energy hearing devices. It is also involved in fitting of customized products. Amplifon S.p.A. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

1.Name: Mr. Gabriele  Galli
1.Title: Exec. of Financial Reporting & Corp. Accounting Information and CFO
